posts.postText: Lately we've been getting some people who can bypass ulx commands such as gags if they are mic spamming. About three times it has happened with each one resulting in that persons ban. Just really annoys players if we can't hear commands, even if they are dead.

Sethhack has a ulx bypass for gagging. That's the main reason why.

It won't matter much as soon as we switch over to sourcebans.
Yeah does this mean a potential fix for the shop? TTT's shop works for me, but not JB.

>> Yeah does this mean a potential fix for the shop? TTT's shop works for me, but not JB.â€‰

Jailbreak shop seems to work better for me, now that things are fixed up a bit more, but I can see this gag thing as a problem. HOWEVER, if they are using hacks in the first place, they should have no right to play on the server. The bans they get are coming, and they are just making it easier for us to get rid of people who would cause future issues.
Nah, shop hasn't improved for me, I was able to use it for some time, gladly I was able to get all the gravity upgrades and a decent outfit.
